title: Crispy Parmesan Roasted Artichoke Hearts
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, seasonflour with salt and pepper. Toss in artichokes until well-coated.
In small bowl, add beaten eggs. In another small bowl, mix together salt, pepper, Parmesan, and Panko. Dredge first in eggs, then in Parmesan-Panko mixture.
Roast artichokes until crispy andolden, 15-18 minutes. Serve with Caesar.
ingredients: 2 15- oz. cans artichoke hearts, drained and pat dry
